whatIs.title: What is Advent of Code?
whatIs.text: Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like.

why.title: Why am I doing this?
why.text: I'm doing this to learn new languages and to improve my problem solving skills.

whatWillYouFind.title: What will you find here?
whatWillYouFind.text:
You will find my solutions to the Advent of Code 2023 puzzles in four different languages: TypeScript, Kotlin, Rust, Go and C++.

You will also be able to put your own input and see the result of the solution.

Additionally, you will find simple animations and visualizations of how the solutions work.
